title: Vector Sum of Forces and Individual Forces

content.question: Students take measurements of the force <math alttext="F sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> , directed to the left, needed to hold the cart in place as well as the tension <math alttext="F sub T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> in the horizontal section of string. The students take three measurements for each force. Which of the following sets of measurements would provide the most precise determination of the correct relationship between the net force and the vector sum of the individual forces exerted on the cart?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub 0, in newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>N</mi></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="F sub T, in newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>N</mi></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub 0, in newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>N</mi></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="F sub T, in newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>N</mi></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4.02" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>4.02</mn></mrow></math>, <math alttext="4.65" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.65</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="4.77" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.77</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub 0, in newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>N</mi></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="F sub T, in newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>N</mi></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4.0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="4.7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="4.8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
